title: Analyse
text:
library(tidyverse)

-- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 --


v ggplot2 3.4.2     v purrr   1.0.1
v tibble  3.2.1     v dplyr   1.1.2

-- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() --
x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
x dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()

library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
library(tidyverse)

-- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 --


v ggplot2 3.4.2     v purrr   1.0.1
v tibble  3.2.1     v dplyr   1.1.2
v tidyr   1.2.0     v stringr 1.5.0
v readr   2.1.2     v forcats 0.5.1


-- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() --
x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
x dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()

library(easystats)

# Attaching packages: easystats 0.6.0 (red = needs update)
v bayestestR  0.13.1   v correlation 0.8.4 
x datawizard  0.7.1    x effectsize  0.8.3 
x insight     0.19.2   v modelbased  0.8.6 
x performance 0.10.3   x parameters  0.21.0
v report      0.5.7    x see         0.8.0 

Restart the R-Session and update packages in red with `easystats::easystats_update()`.

library(tidymodels)

-- Attaching packages -------------------------------------- tidymodels 1.0.0 --


v broom        1.0.4     v rsample      1.0.0
v dials        1.0.0     v tune         1.1.1
v infer        1.0.2     v workflows    1.1.3
v modeldata    1.1.0     v workflowsets 1.0.0
v parsnip      1.0.4     v yardstick    1.0.0
v recipes      1.0.8     


-- Conflicts ----------------------------------------- tidymodels_conflicts() --
x scales::discard()        masks purrr::discard()
x dplyr::filter()          masks stats::filter()
x recipes::fixed()         masks stringr::fixed()
x yardstick::get_weights() masks insight::get_weights()
x dplyr::lag()             masks stats::lag()
x yardstick::mae()         masks performance::mae()
x parsnip::null_model()    masks insight::null_model()
x infer::p_value()         masks parameters::p_value()
x tune::parameters()       masks dials::parameters(), parameters::parameters()
x yardstick::rmse()        masks performance::rmse()
x dials::smoothness()      masks datawizard::smoothness()
x yardstick::spec()        masks readr::spec()
x recipes::step()          masks stats::step()
* Learn how to get started at https://www.tidymodels.org/start/

library(tidytext)  
library(textrecipes)  
library(lsa)  

Lade nötiges Paket: SnowballC

library(discrim)

Das folgende Objekt ist maskiert 'package:dials':

    smoothness


Das folgende Objekt ist maskiert 'package:datawizard':

    smoothness

library(tokenizers)

Das folgende Objekt ist maskiert 'package:datawizard':

    rescale

library(pradadata)
library(beepr)
library(quanteda.textstats)

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
section: Textlänge in Abhängigkeit von c2 Kategorie
text:
Textlänge in Abhängigkeit von c2 Kategorie

train1 <-
  germeval_train |> 
  mutate(text_length = str_length(text))

ggplot(train1, aes(x = c1, y = text_length, color = c2)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Germeval 2018 Datensatz Visualisierung",
       x = "c1",
       y = "Textlänge",
       color = "c2")

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
Histogramm der Textlänge

ggplot(train1, aes(x = text_length)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, fill = "blue", color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Histogramm der Textlängen", x = "Textlänge", y = "Häufigkeit")

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
Boxplot für verschiedene Kateforien

ggplot(train1, aes(x = c1, y = text_length, fill = c2)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Boxplot der Textlängen nach c1", x = "c1", y = "Textlänge", fill = "c2")

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
Model & Folds

# model:
mod1 <-
  rand_forest(mode = "classification")


# cv:
set.seed(42)
rsmpl <- vfold_cv(germeval_train, v = 5)

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
workflow:

wf1

wf1 <-
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(mod1) %>% 
  add_recipe(rec1)



wf2

wf2 <-
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(mod1) %>% 
  add_recipe(rec2)

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
Fit1

tic()
fit1 <-
  fit(wf1,
      data = germeval_train)
toc()

23.27 sec elapsed

beep(3)

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
Fit 2

tic()
fit2 <-
  fit(wf2,
      data = germeval_train)
toc()

92.97 sec elapsed

beep(3)

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
pred1

tic()
preds <-
  predict(fit1, new_data = germeval_test)
toc()

13.9 sec elapsed

title: Miniprojekt tidymodels
text:
pred2

tic()
preds2 <-
  predict(fit2, new_data = germeval_test)
toc()

15.25 sec elapsed



d_test <-
  germeval_test |> 
  bind_cols(preds) |> 
  mutate(c1 = as.factor(c1))

d_test2 <-
  germeval_test |> 
  bind_cols(preds2) |> 
  mutate(c1 = as.factor(c1))


my_metrics <- metric_set(accuracy, f_meas)
my_metrics(d_test,
           truth = c1,
           estimate = .pred_class)



  


my_metrics <- metric_set(accuracy, f_meas)
my_metrics(d_test2,
           truth = c1,
           estimate = .pred_class)

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
